Articles.Content:
Good Day KSP Fans.

Krazy Industires Aerospace:

Would formally like to announce our GALAXY-01 Class, Large Mun Rocket.

A Large Mun Landable Rocket.

Specifications.

Constructed from just 160 Parts. (16 Engines, 52 Tanks, 15 Winglets, 18 RCS Thrusters, 1 Parachute)

ASAS + RCS Systems, for complete control when landing.

60% Throttle Launch Requirment, on 12 Engines

Advisements.

Ideally Launch with ASAS Enabled.

Will happily do single straight burn to Mun at 100% Throttle.

Fuel Conservation is recommended when slowing to land on Mun.

RCS Backup Mun Lander available, in Emergancy.

ASAS available on return, with primary Lander.

Sick Bags NOT included.

Laptop Friendly (May Not Work with Slower Laptops.)
